channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Desktop 4.39: Smarter AI Agent, Docker Desktop CLI in GA, and Effortless Multi-Platform Builds
item.description: Docker Desktop 4.39 brings Docker AI Agent for real-time help, plus Bake for faster builds and Multi-Node Kubernetes for better testing. Learn more! Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-desktop-4-39/
